class_notes: Registration for this class is only for students in the Transactional Certificate Program. DO NOT TRY TO ENROLL IF YOU DID NOT RECEIVE A SPECIFIC ENROLLMENT WINDOW!
course_description: Team members prepare for oral negotiations, practice negotiation techniques, and draft transactional documents under the direction of one or more faculty advisors for regional, and potentially national, competitions. A student selected to compete is eligible for credit in the semester in which the competition is held.
